spec_data.Name: boost-filesystem
spec_data.Description:
Run-time support for the Boost Filesystem Library, which provides
portable facilities to query and manipulate paths, files, and
directories.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 25 Sep 2017 01:05:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Run-time component of boost filesystem library
